verses.verse: In like <S%G3668>manner<s%>, ye <S%G1135>wives<s%>, be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> obey <S%G544>not<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%>, they <S%G2770>may<s%> <S%G427>without<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> be <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G391>behavior<s%> of their <S%G1135>wives<s%>;
beholding <S%G2029><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G53>chaste<s%> <S%G391>behavior<s%> coupled <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>.

Whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2889>adorning<s%> let <S%G2077>it<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2077>be<s%> the <S%G1855>outward<s%> adorning of <S%G1708>braiding<s%> the <S%G2359>hair<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4025>wearing<s%> jewels of <S%G5553>gold<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> of putting <S%G1745>on<s%> <S%G2440>apparel<s%>;

but <S%G235><s%> let it be the <S%G2927>hidden<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G862>incorruptible<s%> apparel of a <S%G4239>meek<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2272>quiet<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> of great <S%G4185>price<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> after this <S%G3779>manner<s%> <S%G4218>aforetime<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, who <S%G1679>hoped<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2885>adorned<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, being in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%>:

as <S%G5613><s%> <S%G4564>Sarah<s%> <S%G5219>obeyed<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2564>calling<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%>: <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> ye now <S%G1096>are<s%>, if ye do <S%G15>well<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5399>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> put in <S%G5399>fear<s%> by <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G4423>terror<s%>.

Ye <S%G435>husbands<s%>, in like <S%G3668>manner<s%>, dwell <S%G4924>with<s%> your wives according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>, <S%G632>giving<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> unto the <S%G1134>woman<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> unto the <S%G772>weaker<s%> <S%G4632>vessel<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> being also <S%G4789>joint-heirs<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>; to the end <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%> <S%G1581>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1581>hindered<s%>.
Finally <S%G5056><s%>, be ye <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3675>likeminded<s%>, <S%G4835>compassionate<s%>, loving as <S%G5361>brethren<s%>, <S%G2155>tenderhearted<s%>, <S%G5391>humbleminded<s%>:

not <S%G3361><s%> <S%G591>rendering<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3059>reviling<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G3059>reviling<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5121>contrariwise<s%> <S%G2127>blessing<s%>; for1492, 3754 hereunto1519, 5124 <S%G2564>were<s%> ye <S%G2564>called<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> ye should <S%G2816>inherit<s%> a <S%G2129>blessing<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%>, He that <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, Let him <S%G3973>refrain<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5491>lips<s%> that they <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1388>guile<s%>:

And let him turn <S%G1578>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>; Let him <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1377>pursue<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> are <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1162>supplication<s%>: <S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1909>upon<s%> them that <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is he that will <S%G2559>harm<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> ye <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3402>zealous<s%> of that which is <S%G18>good<s%>?

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye should <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>' sake, <S%G3107>blessed<s%> are <S%G1161>ye<s%>: and <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>, <S%G3366>neither<s%> be <S%G5015>troubled<s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G37>sanctify<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G2962>Christ<s%> as <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G1161><s%> being <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> give <S%G627>answer<s%> to every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G154>asketh<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> a <S%G3056>reason<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, yet <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4240>meekness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>:

having <S%G2192><s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%>, wherein3739, 1722 <S%G5216>ye<s%> are spoken <S%G2635>against<s%>, 5613, 2555 they may be put to <S%G2617>shame<s%> who <S%G1908>revile<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> manner of <S%G391>life<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2909>better<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G2309>so<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%>, that ye <S%G3958>suffer<s%> for <S%G2228>well-doing<s%> than for <S%G2554>evil-doing<s%>.

Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> also2532, 3958 <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G530>once<s%>, the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> the <S%G94>unrighteous<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G4317>bring<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>; being put to <S%G2289>death<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> made <S%G2227>alive<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>;
in <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G2784>preached<s%> unto the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>,

that <S%G4218>aforetime<s%> were <S%G544>disobedient<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G530>the<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1551>waited<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G3575>Noah<s%>, while the <S%G2787>ark<s%> was a <S%G2680>preparing<s%>, wherein1519, 3739 <S%G3641>few<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>, were <S%G1295>saved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%>:

which <S%G3739><s%> also after a true <S%G499>likeness<s%> <S%G4982>doth<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G2248>you<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G908>baptism<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> the putting <S%G595>away<s%> of the <S%G4509>filth<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G1906>interrogation<s%> of a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, having <S%G4198>gone<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>; <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>authorities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1411>powers<s%> being made <S%G5293>subject<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>.
